United States - History - Civil War, 1861-1865; United States - Army - Quartermaster Corps; Tennessee - History - Civil War, 1861-1865
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Officers of the Quartermaster's Department, Nashville, Tennessee, July 1864, "James F. Rusling , Nash." is handwritten in the lower left corner.
The Quartermaster Corps is responsible for keeping equipment and supplies functioning and available to the officers and their troops, and transporting supplies to new locations as needed.
